A young person in Cao
Lanh city, Dong Thap province, turned his
family's mango orchard into a
specialty fish pond.  Earning billions of profits every
year, this is the area of ​​two silver-lined ponds
invested by farmer Nguyen Chi Tam to raise
snakehead loach and red-blind dolphin. This is a dolphin
with this dolphin, if we talk
about nature.  It will be scarce in the future,
but its economic value is high,
so from then on I had the idea that I would
focus on raising these two fish in the two
current ponds.  By rotating stocking every
6 months, the profit of the number of snakehead loach
and red-tailed dolphin after harvest,
minus the costs, he earns more than half a billion VND.
Currently, the output of the two types of fish is very stable.
Economic efficiency of the model  This is very
high. In the coming time, under the
role of the Farmers' Association of

specific surveys and assessments so that we

use of this area.  The area of ​​garden land used to make

then spread into people's houses, causing chaos.
Residents received news to alert the

soldiers arrived at the scene of the fire, which was

passing through Long Dinh commune, Chau Thanh district,
Tien Giang, a
traffic accident between two motorbikes occurred, causing three
casualties according to witnesses.  Witnesses to the

special license plate controlled by a
young man was waiting with a girl behind,
both of them were about 17 years old, traveling
on Highway 1A heading from Ho City.  Ho
Chi Minh to the West while the car was
passing through the At Dong area, Long

with a motorbike also carrying Tien
Giang registration plate, driven by a man about 60
years old.  Traffic in the same
direction ahead on the road had a
strong impact, causing all three people and the vehicle to
fall onto the road. After the accident, all three
injured people were taken to the
hospital for emergency treatment. However, on the way
to the hospital, the  The man died
thanks to the news that
Trung Luong Traffic Control Station coordinated with
relevant professional units to
regulate traffic and investigate the cause of the
accident. Social networks are spreading the
video clip.  Photo of a car running
away while being chased by traffic police.
According to information from the
Traffic Police Department, the incident happened yesterday
afternoon on Highway 1, a section through
Lang
Son province. At this time, the working group discovered
The passenger car driven by Mr. Nguyen Van Giang, 50
years old, from Bac Ninh, was speeding beyond the
prescribed speed limit, so he signaled to stop for
inspection and handling. However, the driver did
not comply and continued driving when
the police pursued him.  Chasing this person, he
zigzagged and hit the road many times, then
repeatedly crashed into the back of a specialized police vehicle.
After stopping the vehicle, the police
determined that this was a passenger-carrying vehicle
without a camera to monitor the
journey.  Passengers do not have a
contract and the list of driver transport contracts
does not have alcohol or drug levels.
Currently, Huu Lung Lang Son district police
are completing documents to temporarily detain criminal
driver Nguyen Van Giang and handle the case.

hundreds of doctors protested last night against the
Korean government's plan to increase medical
school admission quotas.
Huri doll festival is an important cultural feature
in Japanese life
every day.  Hundreds of Ky doctors in South Korea
held a protest near the
Presidential Office in the capital on
February 25 to support young doctors and
protest the government's plan to increase medical
school admission quotas.
About 400 Doctors gathered at the
Korean Medical Association building to discuss
their plans and then took to the streets
with banners protesting the government's
pursuit of a Unilateral policy that threatens
public health by more than 7,800.  South
Korea's retired interns and residents
are only a small fraction of the
country's 100,000 doctors, but they play an
important role in daily operations at
Government hospitals and medical centers.
The South Korean government has announced plans to increase the
number of students admitted to
medical schools by 2,000 each year starting in the
2025 school year. However, protesting doctors
say the real problem is wages and
working conditions.  work, not the number of
doctors, in recent days, Tom Isaki's temple in
Kassa city, Japan, has always been crowded with
visitors thanks to the display area of
1,800 traditional dolls. This is an
annual event managed by the board.  The temple is
organized to celebrate the famous Hina Mat Tasuri festival.
The dolls are lined up along the
60 steps leading to Tomis Saki Shrine.
They represent the emperors,
queens and nobles in the palace during the
Doll Festival.  Hina mauri is an
important cultural feature in Japanese life.
Truong dolls help families
wish their daughters good health.
This year we display about 10
dolls throughout the city according to the
local government  Most of the dolls
displayed at the temple and in the
city are donated by people from all over Japan. At
Tomak Shrine, the display of dolls is
done by people in the West every
morning and they will put them away at night.

3 in Iran's capital Tan. A group of
artists is trying to create a new discipline by
creating a giant art statue
using balloons.  With
tens of thousands of colorful balloons,
it is attracting attention in the community and has just
received a certificate of merit from the
government. The work was done at the
200 m long megamon complex created by
70,000 colorful balloons.
This is the effort of 17 local artists.
Truong Doi said it took them 10 days
to complete this project and then spent another
5 days to reinforce the structures of the statue, which
simulates Iran's traditional L-type ship.
Unesco recognized it as a
non-Buddhist heritage with its current scale. The
statue has received a certificate confirming
Iran's national record. We
are also sending the statue's dossier to
Guinness and hope to have it established.
Besides the
